column4: is there any big risk to extending my extended partition to 150gb?
actually, to adding 150gb onto my extended partition to make it about 211GB?
Greatest is probably doing it wrong. It should be fine. You are recommended to make backups before modifying partitions though

all that's on it is my home partition, and i'll make a complete backup using rsync to another partition before I modiy it.  I've resized ubuntu partitions before and kept ubuntu wokring, but never an extended partition, so I just needed to know wether there was any extra risk.  Thank you
